players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso. We need to vote her out now to protect the town."
Diana: "Charlie, why are you so quick to accuse me? Bob was killed last night, and you're already pointing fingers. That seems a bit suspicious to me."
You: "Bob was killed last night, which means the mafioso is still out there. Charlie's quick accusation of Diana might be a tactic to shift blame. We need more evidence before voting."
Charlie: "Diana is the only mafioso among us. We can't afford to hesitate and risk losing more town members. Alice, I understand caution, but waiting will only help Diana."
You: "I think we should consider why Charlie is so certain about Diana without any proof. Rushing to vote without more info could lead us to lose an innocent town member."

Diana: "Alice has a point. Charlie is being very aggressive and trying to push a vote without any real evidence. It's more likely Charlie is the mafioso trying to create chaos and get an innocent lynched."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
